comments:
Build: F3
1. In the New Fragment wizard, enter 'com.example.fragment' as the name of the 
fragment project.  Click 'Next' three times.
2. On the last page of the wizard, browse and select the external 
plugin 'org.eclipse.pde.ui'
The plug-in version field now contains 2.0.0 and the 'Finish' button is enabled.
3. Click 'Finish', you get the null pointer exception below.
This problem only occurs when the plug-in chosen is an external plug-in project.
Everything works fine if the plug-in is in the workspace.
